stream_defs.default: dealer ! pipe name=encoder t=H265 ! mux name=amux
stream_defs.calib: mux name=mux ! pgl_calibrator name=calibrator w=1024 h=1024 d=0 ! pipe name=encoder t=H265

default.dealer.def: mux name=mux ! pcuda_remapper name=remapper debayer=I420 rg=1.01 bg=0.99 vg=1.0 sg=1.0 sh=10 ho=1 edge_r="0.1" s=@APP.SIZE@ n_vstreams=1
default.mux.vin0: nc_capture name=capture zerocopy=1 expo=0 gain=100 binning=1 cam_idx=1
default.mux.vin1: nc_capture name=capture zerocopy=1 expo=0 gain=100 binning=1 cam_idx=0
default.encoder.def: gst-launch-1.0 -q fdsrc ! rawvideoparse width=@IWIDTH@ height=@IHEIGHT@ framerate=30/1 format=i420 ! omxh265enc iframeinterval=300 bitrate=@APP.BITRATE@ control-rate=2 ! h265parse ! video/x-h265,stream-format=byte-stream,alignment=nal ! fdsink

calib.mux.vin0: nc_capture name=capture zerocopy=1 expo=0 gain=100 binning=1 debayer=1 cam_idx=1
calib.mux.vin1: nc_capture name=capture zerocopy=1 expo=0 gain=100 binning=1 debayer=1 cam_idx=0
calib.encoder.def: gst-launch-1.0 fdsrc ! rawvideoparse width=@IWIDTH@ height=@IHEIGHT@ framerate=30/1 format=rgba ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw,format=I420 ! omxh265enc iframeinterval=300 bitrate=@APP.BITRATE@ control-rate=2 ! h265parse ! video/x-h265,stream-format=byte-stream,alignment=nal ! fdsink
